categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: Indigo was the male leader of the Dar'manda, a group of former Mandalorians operating in Mek-Sha during the third galactic war between the Galactic Republic and reconstituted Sith Empire.

After the attack on the Spirit of Vengeance II, Indigo denied any involvement in the affair to the Commander. However, Shae Vizla still believed that Indigo was in some way connected to the attack and could help her track down Heta Kol's Hidden Chain. She visited Indigo on Mek-Sha to investigate.

During the Mek-Sha storyline of the Onslaught expansion, the player, whether on the side of the Republic or Empire, can appeal to Indigo or Veek the Sneak for the majority vote to sell fuel to the Republic. If the player brings Akaavi Spar, Shae Vizla, or Torian Cadera to meet Indigo, he will walk away in disgust, saying that he does not deal with Mandalorians or their kind. Otherwise, he will request the player to meet him in private, where he will demand the player kill Veek as a condition for his support. Accepting Indigo's deal grants the player dark side points, while refusing grants the player light side points, though the player can later return to Indigo. Should the player go to Veek afterwards and tell the Rodian, he remarks that this won't sit well with Indigo.
If a Republic player sided with Indigo, he will later provide the Republic forces with premium weapons.
